item.description:
Ricker Hill Orchards offers organic apple picking as well as non organic varieties. Pull on a warm sweater and a pair of comfortable blue jeans & join us for an afternoon of apple picking fun.

(will be cancelled in the case of rain)
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet in the parking lot by the organic orchards.
item.why: Nothing is more perfect than an organic apple picked right off the tree. Bring a big canvas tote and pick apples to feed you well into the winter.

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine Field Trip! Apple Picking @ Ricker Hill
